data.title: Ledger Expands Asset Coverage with Ethereum L2 Celo Integration
data.description: Ledger has expanded its asset coverage with the Celo blockchain, which is built for the real world and designed for fast, low-cost transactions globally. Their latest partnership builds on a foundation of secure Celo management within Ledger Wallet, expanding functionality with cross-chain sending, receiving, and swapping. Celo and Ledger Advance Relationship ...
data.keywords: Ledger Wallet, Ledger, Celo, digital asset
